Package cinnamon.engine.gfx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    Drawables carry information needed for something to be drawn such as a Texture's id, the size to draw with, and more.
    OnDrawOrderChangeListener
    Listener to be called whenever the ImageFactory's drawable data order may need to be updated.
    OnDrawVisibilityChangedListener
    Listener to be called whenever the ImageFactory's drawing data may need to be updated.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Canvas<E extends Viewport>
    Represents an OpenGL backed drawing surface.
    Color
    TODO fix component setting incorrectly saving normalized values Created by chris on 6/2/2017.
    ColorTest  
    GLBuffer
    A GLBuffer helps organize VBOs when drawing in a Canvas.
    Scene<E extends Viewport>  
    SceneBuffer<E extends Scene>
    SceneBuffer acts as an intermediary between the Game's updating and the Canvas's drawing.
    ShaderFactory
    ShaderFactory initiates shader source file loading, texture loading, and provides lookup for said resources.
    ShaderLoader
    ShaderLoader loads shader source files from a jar's resources and constructs ShaderObject to be later linked for OpenGL use as ShaderPrograms.
    ShaderManager
    Manages the lifecycle of ShaderPrograms and shader objects as well as provides program lookup.
    ShaderProgram
    Represents a shader program combining a vertex shader and fragment shader for drawing operations.
    TextureLoader
    TextureLoader loads images from a jar's resources and prepares it for OpenGL use.
    TextureManager  
    Viewport  
    Window
    Represents an application window wrapping the GLFW windowing library.
    Window.Input
    Facilitates a connection to the Window's keyboard and mouse input.
    WindowTest
    These tests do not assert the underlying GLFW toolkit's state and instead focus on the Window class itself.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ShaderManager.ShaderType
    Constants representing shader types.
